amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to revise Management Directive 11056 relative to the treatment of certain sensitive security information.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4579 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4579 proposed by Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S7327-7328; text: CR S7327-7328) To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to revise Management Directive 11056 relative to the treatment of certain sensitive security information.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4579 proposed by Senator Gregg.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4579 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
